de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.repositories

Interface ServerPackRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ServerPack,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ServerPack,java.lang.Integer>

    @Repository
public interface ServerPackRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ServerPack,java.lang.Integer>
    Our JPA repository for storing and retrieving ServerPacks to and from our SQLite database. Provides methods for retrieving, storing, deleting. Calls must always be made from ServerPackService and not directly to this repository. It may seem strange, but this accomplishes a couple of things:
    1. Centralized access to the repository.
    2. Complete control over what happens with the data retrieved from the repository.
    3. Complete control over what happens with the data passed to the repository.
    4. Better management and overview of what we are doing with our repository.

    • Method Detail

      • findAllByProjectID

        java.util.Optional<java.util.List<ServerPack>> findAllByProjectID(int projectID)
        Find all server packs using a CurseForge project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Integer. The CurseForge project ID with which to search for server pack.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all server packs for the passed CurseForge project ID wrapped in an Optional. I recommend to make use of Optional.isPresent() and Optional.get().

      • findByProjectIDAndFileID

        java.util.Optional<ServerPack> findByProjectIDAndFileID(int projectID,
                                                        int fileID)
        Find a specific server pack by searching with a CurseForge project and file ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Integer. The CurseForge project ID.
        fileID - Integer. The CurseForge project file ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the server pack for the passed project and file ID wrapped in an Optional. I recommend to make use of Optional.isPresent() and Optional.get().
